markdownRemark.excerpt: As Gavin and I have started exploring Virtual Reality as a platform, we’ve been doing a lot of thought experiments. It’s a whole new medium and working against a medium’s expectations is where the real fun is. https://www.stereoscopy.com/faq/anaglyphs.html
markdownRemark.html:
As Gavin and I have started exploring Virtual Reality as a platform, we’ve been doing a lot of thought experiments. It’s a whole new medium and working against a medium’s expectations is where the real fun is.

https://www.stereoscopy.com/faq/anaglyphs.html
